CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.location AS SELECT l.id, l.name, l.description, l.notes, res.name AS research, l.pinned, r.name AS updated_by, l.update_date FROM ruleform.location l LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON l.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.agency r ON l.updated_by = r.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.location OWNER TO core;
